participant_1.background:
I'm into music, but my dog, Socks, doesn't seem to care.
I remember the smell of my mom's cooking and the sound of my dad's laughter.
my eyes are green.
I'm still getting to know my boss.
i like pepsi.

participant_2.background:
My parents are supportive of my career as a translator.
I spend my free time training and relaxing.
i am a mom with two sons and a husband.
I take time to enjoy nature and spend time with my mother.
My work schedule is hectic and I have trouble staying in touch with my family.

content.text: Hello! How is your day going?
It's going good! I just got back from training. I'm a personal trainer and I love my job! What about you?
That's awesome! I'm a translator and I love my job as well. I'm just finishing up a translation and then I'm going to spend some time with my family.
That sounds like a nice plan! What kind of music do you like?
I like all kinds of music, but I'm really into rap and hip hop right now. What about you?
I'm more into rock and roll and classic rock. I love the Beatles and the Rolling Stones!
Those are great bands! I love the Beatles too!
My parents were big fans of them and they used to play their music all the time when I was growing up.
That's so cool! I'm sure you have some good memories of listening to their music with your parents.
I do! Thanks for chatting with me! I have to get going now, but it was nice talking to you!
You too! Have a great day!
